projects.name: Intelligent Revenue Management Platform for Tolling
projects.description: A real-time toll collection and management system that uses CCTV image analysis to recognize license plates and vehicle categories, with integrated reporting modules for comprehensive operational insights.

projects.name: PHALAK â€” Bangla Vehicle Number Plate Recognition
projects.description: A real-time Bangla vehicle number plate recognition system capable of detecting various local vehicle types, colors, and BRTA-standard plates. Leveraged ML & DL models and GPU acceleration for efficient processing and high accuracy.

projects.name: AI-Powered Online Exam Proctoring Platform
projects.description: Computer vision system achieving 93% detection accuracy for online examination monitoring.

projects.name: City Surveillance System with Video Analytics
projects.description: ANPR dashboard for Bengali number plates processing multiple live CCTV feeds with fuzzy search and queue management.

projects.name: MEED Banking Platform with eKYC and Fraud Detection
projects.description: Customer onboarding with ML-based identity verification, fraud detection, OFAC compliance, and multi-country fund transfers.

projects.name: End-to-End RAG Pipeline
projects.description: High-precision Retrieval-Augmented Generation system for context-aware AI responses at scale.

projects.name: Sign Language Recognition System
projects.description: Real-time hand gesture to natural language and animation translation with HamNoSys-based mapping.

projects.name: Airways Ticket Reservation RPA Agent
projects.description: A Robotic Process Automation (RPA)-driven solution that automates the entire ticket booking process, handling tasks from login to ticket download, and is designed to streamline booking workflows across multiple airline systems.
